reviewText: It contains mostly what The Story of Us contained - so it is replicative. The sound is also bad and wavers from loud to soft. If you buy the Story of Us the American Revolution, the content is already there so skip this one - "Rebels".
It arrived on time and as stated
This DVD is perfect for my 5th grade class when we discuss the American Revolution. It covers the years that we discuss.

I teach 5th grade US History and my students loved it.  It was a great way for them to visualize events that we have studied.  I broke it up into chunks based on our units of study, but nevertheless my inner city students were actively engaged.
